title: DragonBlade Riven - Clunky Anitmations, Unresponsive Gameplay
body: The DragonBlade Riven skin has a distinctly different feel to it when compared to all other riven skins, animations cancelling and overall movement is more difficult, and noticeably more clunky. This is readily apparent when switching between the default Riven Skin and DragonBlade. Animation canceling, especially on Q, is near broken and makes the skin unfit for play.

replies.body:
Hey Loghan,

Dragonblade Riven uses the same animation set as other Riven skins, which means that animations and movement should not be affected. 

From what I understand (I've asked several Riven mains), the difference between this skin and the other skin is the (Q) sound. Since it's different than her other skins, it feels a bit different and may take a bit of adjusting. 

The different sounds are intended behavior for this skin.
